title: Tales From Wonderland: Alice
description: Wonderland never lets go easily! Grimm Fairy Tales presents Tales from Wonderland: Alice, the first in a series of one-shot prequels that will offer insight into the madness of the terrifying realm. Before Calie's nightmare journey, before Johnny's decent into madness, before the horror that tore a family apart, there was a child named Alice who entered a foreign world only to return forever changed. Her sanity would be taken, but her life would not be wasted. Witness the story of the girl who lost everything only to become an unlikely hero. Also features the final 8-page back-up story that will reveal the true origin and discovery of the world known only as Wonderland.
author: Raven Gregory
